name: Gallery Mementos: Infinita Prospectus
description:
Infinita Prospectus, latin for Infinite Perspectives, is a collectible from Gallery Mementos that celebrates the release of our multi-gallery feature, an evolution in the way users can express themselves on Gallery. With multi-gallery, users can create an infinite number of Galleries to express their diverse tastes and the entire spectrum of their collection.

Gallery Mementos are a living collection of treasures that will come to tell the story of the development of Gallery and its community. You can read more about Gallery Mementos [here](https://gallery.mirror.xyz/uoO9Fns67sYzX14eRQHiO6sXz2Ojh5qKR0-Sc0F2vZY).
